{"currentConversationId":"70443cb5-9d6b-4391-8405-dcb28d26cc53","conversations":{"64441f49-e90e-47b7-8afe-717cb562a6ce":{"id":"64441f49-e90e-47b7-8afe-717cb562a6ce","createdAtIso":"2025-06-12T07:55:21.789Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-06-12T07:59:33.104Z","chatHistory":[{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"temp-fe-4798691a-5a5e-4eda-8f08-62bb1a116a07","timestamp":"2025-06-12T07:59:33.104Z","request_message":"帮我用h5和go开发一个深圳大学扫码物资签领应用，需求清单如下：一、功能需求 
1. 用户端核心功能 
扫码入口： 
移动端首页提供显著“扫码签领”按钮（建议位置：页面中心）。 
按钮支持点击触发扫码功能，支持物理返回键退出扫码界面。 
扫码操作： 

调用手机摄像头实时扫描，支持自动对焦（弱光环境下需提示“请确保光线充足”）。 
仅识别“深圳大学个人二维码”（需限定二维码格式/加密规则，避免外部二维码干扰）。 
扫码失败时提示“二维码识别失败，请重试”，并自动返回扫码界面。 
信息获取与验证： 

扫码成功后，调用深圳大学微信二微码解码接口解码二维码，提取用户信息（姓名、工号）。 然后查询该人是否领用物品
若未领取：界面显示“扫码成功！姓名（工号），您可领取物资”，并自动跳转至签领确认页（需用户点击“确认领取”完成操作）。 
若已领取：界面显示“扫码成功！姓名（工号），您已领取过该物资，无法重复领取”，并提示“如有疑问请联系管理员”。 
func GetUserInfoFromWXiaoCode(wxCode string, responseData *utils.ResponseData, deviceId string) {
	url := "https://weixiao.qq.com/apps/school-api/campus-code"
	client := &http.Client{
		Timeout: 3 * time.Second,
	}

	timestamp := strconv.Itoa(int(time.Now().Unix()))
	row := "app_key=294D49AA3C42288C" +
		"&auth_code=" + wxCode +
		"&device_no=device-1213" +
		"&location=电子哨兵" +
		"&nonce=5K8264ILTKCH16CQ2502SI8ZNMTM67VS" +
		"&scene=1&school_code=4144010590&timestamp=" + timestamp +
		"&key=7B1E3CE1E0EB5221119E8380397554C7"
	signature := strings.ToUpper(utils.MD5Crypt(row))

	var wxDataRequest utils.WxDataRequest
	wxDataRequest.App_key = "294D49AA3C42288C"
	wxDataRequest.Timestamp = timestamp
	wxDataRequest.Nonce = "5K8264ILTKCH16CQ2502SI8ZNMTM67VS"
	wxDataRequest.Signature = signature
	wxDataRequest.School_code = "4144010590"
	wxDataRequest.Auth_code = wxCode
	wxDataRequest.Scene = "1"
	wxDataRequest.Device_no = "device-1213"
	wxDataRequest.Location = "电子哨兵"

	Body, err := json.Marshal(wxDataRequest)
	if err != nil {
		responseData.Code = 400
		responseData.Msg = "二维码已失效"
		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}

	reader := bytes.NewReader([]byte(Body))

	req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", url, reader)
	if err != nil {
		responseData.Code = 400
		responseData.Msg = "二维码已失效"
		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}
	req.Header.Set("Content-Type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Set("Connection", "keep-alive")
	resp, err := client.Do(req)
	if err != nil {
		responseData.Code = 400
		responseData.Msg = "二维码已失效"
		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}
	defer resp.Body.Close()
	body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
	if err != nil {
		responseData.Code = 400
		responseData.Msg = "二维码已失效"
		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}
	fmt.Println(string(body))
	var wxDataResponse utils.WxDataResponse
	err = json.Unmarshal(body, &wxDataResponse)
	if err != nil {
		responseData.Code = 400
		responseData.Msg = "二维码已失效"
		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}
	responseData.Xgh = wxDataResponse.User.Card_number
	if wxDataResponse.Code == 0 {
		if wxDataResponse.User.Identity_type == "5" || wxDataResponse.User.Identity_type == "4" {
			//校友
			responseData.Name = "校友"
			responseData.Dept = "校友"
			responseData.Code = 200
			responseData.Msg = "查询成功"
			responseData.PassCode = 1
			responseData.CredentialNo = wxDataResponse.User.Card_number
			responseData.IsNeedHealthData = false
			//GetWXUserInfo(wxDataResponse.User.Card_number,responseData)
			return
		}
		if GetUserInfoFromMySqlByStudentID(wxDataResponse.User.Card_number, responseData) {
			return
		}

		GetUserInfoFromAPI(wxDataResponse.User.Card_number, responseData)
	} else {
		responseData.Code = 400
		//fmt.Println(wxDataResponse.Message)
		responseData.Msg = wxDataResponse.Message
	}

	return
}","status":"sent","hasResponse":false,"isStreaming":true,"seen_state":"seen"}],"feedbackStates":{"temp-fe-4798691a-5a5e-4eda-8f08-62bb1a116a07":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""}},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"status":"draft"},"draftActiveContextIds":["/:L346-442","F:/code/go/src/materials/main.go","F:/code/go/src/materialsfalsefalse","userGuidelines"],"requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":false,"extraData":{"hasDirtyEdits":false},"personaType":0,"rootTaskUuid":"15932035-ce83-4109-afbc-6b375ebf9364"},"55671aa2-2349-4daa-b406-b68e0345ad4b":{"id":"55671aa2-2349-4daa-b406-b68e0345ad4b","createdAtIso":"2025-06-12T07:59:43.061Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-06-16T04:53:31.908Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"ed110cee-f602-49c5-b265-1ca15b568035","uuid":"db944653-07ef-43b3-a0eb-355b84b414ed","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1749715183064,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"7ca46356-3936-4e97-b6d1-70a3a092d3ff","timestamp":"2025-06-12T07:59:55.537Z","request_message":"帮我用h5和go开发一个深圳大学扫码物资签领应用，需求清单如下：一、功能需求

func GetUserInfoFromWXiaoCode(wxCode string, responseData *utils.ResponseData, deviceId string) {
	url := "https://weixiao.qq.com/apps/school-api/campus-code"
	client := &http.Client{

	reader := bytes.NewReader([]byte(Body))

		responseData.Code = 400

		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}
	responseData.Xgh = wxDataResponse.User.Card_number
	if wxDataResponse.Code == 0 {

	} else {

		responseData.Msg = wxDataResponse.Message

	return

pSecret和agentId要使用  getAgentConfigSignature // 必填，根据url生成应用签名的回调函数
})

async function getConfigSignature(url) {
 // 根据 url 生成企业签名
 // 生成方法参考 https://developer.work.weixin.qq.com/document/14924
 return { timestamp, nonceStr, signature }
}

async function getAgentConfigSignature(url) {
 // 根据 url 生成应用签名，生成方法同上，但需要使用应用的 jsapi_ticket
 return { timestamp, nonceStr, signature }
}

_state":"seen"},{"request_id":"2ada3ffd-a332-4716-8af3-64ab9517b85f","status":"cancelled","chatItemType":"agentic-turn-delimiter"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"a4f83dc6-672d-4603-a8c8-0b808e9db6ab","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:11:51.870Z","request_message":"帮我对接一下深圳大学的单点登录，y用户登录后在首页显示用户的姓名，相关代码在auth文件， 文档如下：<%@Language=JScript%> 
<%
//本代码保存为caslogin.asp，功能包括登录、获取用户信息和注销退出等，仅供参考
//MyServer是您的应用URL，须通过申请流程在信息中心备案授权：
//【企业微信—>工作台—>统一身份认证CAS接口】申请—>单位领导审批—>信息中心受理

//用户信息默认为XML格式
//用户信息支持返回JSON格式，读取用户信息时需增加参数format=json，下方代码改为：
//var url=CAS_Server+"serviceValidate?format=json&ticket="+ticket+"&service="+MyServer+MyPage;

var MyPage="caslogin.asp";
var MyServer="http://www1.szu.edu.cn/myinfo/";
var CAS_Server="https://authserver.szu.edu.cn/authserver/";

//注销登录
if(Request.QueryString.Item("refresh").Item=="logout")
{
	Session.Abandon();
	Response.Redirect(CAS_Server+"logout?service="+MyServer+MyPage);
	Response.End;
}

var ticket=Request.QueryString.Item("ticket").Item;
//跳转用户登录
if(!ticket)
{
	Response.Redirect(CAS_Server+"login?service="+MyServer+MyPage);
	Response.End;
}

//根据ticket获取用户信息
else
{
	var userID = "-";//学工号，即教师工号或学生学号
	var userName = "-";//姓名
	var userCardid = "-";//校园卡号
	var userOrgname = "-";//学院

	var http=Server.CreateObject("MSXML2.ServerXMLHTTP.4.0");
	http.setOption(2,13056);
	var url=CAS_Server+"serviceValidate?ticket="+ticket+"&service="+MyServer+MyPage;
	http.open("GET",url,false);
	http.send();

	//读取学工号姓名卡号单位
	var resp = http.responseXML;
	resp.setProperty("SelectionNamespaces","xmlns:cas=\"http://www.yale.edu/tp/cas\"");
	var snode=resp.selectSingleNode("//cas:user");
	if(snode) userID = snode.nodeTypedValue;
	var snode=resp.selectSingleNode("//cas:cn");
	if(snode) userName = snode.nodeTypedValue;
	var snode=resp.selectSingleNode("//cas:alias");
	if(snode) userCardid = snode.nodeTypedValue;
	var snode=resp.selectSingleNode("//cas:eduPersonOrgDN");
	if(snode) userOrgname = snode.nodeTypedValue;

//附：用户容器类似于用户类别（因随时调整，不建议使用）：
//cas:containerId——用户容器，如本科生、研究生、教职工、其他学生和其他人员等
//cas:containerId的值为字符串，格式为：ou=容器代码,ou=People
//主要容器代码：
//jzg在职教职工、lzjzg离职教职工、txjzg退休教职工、bks本科生、yjs研究生、qtxs其他学生
//cjyg成教员工、xwds校外导师、kyry科研系统账号、qtry其他人员
//bybks毕业本科生、byyjs毕业研究生、byqtxs毕业其他学生 ……等等

}

//在当前页显示用户信息
Response.Write("<a href="+MyPage+">[刷新]</a> <a href="+MyPage+"?refresh=logout>[注销]</a><br>");
Response.Write("用户信息:<br>学工号：");
Response.Write(userID);
Response.Write("<br>卡号：");
Response.Write(userCardid);
Response.Write("<br>姓名：");
Response.Write(userName);
Response.Write("<br>学院：");
Response.Write(userOrgname);
%>","status":"success","hasResponse":true,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"request_id":"25335180-6c87-415d-a8af-f21fbb04ce30","uuid":"250062f3-12a5-45c2-b08a-be8be4b8d94f","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":1749805530119,"toTimestamp":1750043512110,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"36cd2eb6-994c-4ee9-8f99-7d1d08ba354d","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:12:06.849Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":true,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"5db0c68e-17d4-472d-852b-9ddaa1b52dc9","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:12:16.202Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":true,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"85ea2dfd-8db7-4390-b7e6-f407f7ab6477","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:12:23.505Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":true,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"6e40656a-0d61-427e-8353-dcf6311ae713","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:12:35.033Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":true,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"55c73f81-d7d5-41fc-bcf3-7264fd06b672","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:13:12.121Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":true,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"05cbf119-a544-4a5d-9aea-4ce67b3da5c0","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:13:27.913Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":false,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"1c4955cb-ff79-4a5c-af8a-831fb9fd4c1f","timestamp":"2025-06-16T03:13:42.301Z","request_message":"","status":"success","hasResponse":false,"isStreaming":false,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"5b87f5f7-590e-4463-b4ca-9  30	func GetWeworkConfig(c *gin.Context) {
 31		// 企业微信配置信息
 32		config := WeworkConfig{
 33			CorpID: "ww563e8adbd544adf5", // 替换为你的企业ID

 37			NonceStr: generateNonceStr(),
 38		}
 39	
 40		// 获取jsapi_ticket
 41		jsapiTicket, err := utils.GetJsapiTicket()
 42		if err != nil {
 43			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 44				"code": 500,
 45				"msg": "获取jsapi_ticket失败",
 46				"error": err.Error(),
 47			})
 48			return
 49		}
 50	
 51		// 生成签名
 52		config.Signature = generateSignature(jsapiTicket, config.NonceStr, config.Timestamp, getCurrentURL(c))
 53	
 54		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 55			"code": 200,
 56			"msg": "success",
 57			"data": config,
 58		})
 59	}

 61	// 生成随机字符串
 62	func generateNonceStr() string {
 63		const charset = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789"
 64		b := make([]byte, 16)
 65		for i := range b {
 66			b[i] = charset[rand.Intn(len(charset))]
 67		}
 68		return string(b)
 69	}

 27		r := gin.Default()
 28	
 29		// 认证路由（不需要认证）
 30		r.GET("/login", handlers.Login)
 31		r.GET("/logout", handlers.Logout)
 32		r.GET("/cas/callback", handlers.CASCallback)

 35		r.Use(handlers.AuthMiddleware())
 36

 38		r.Static("/static", "./static")

 14		sessionManager *auth.SessionManager
 15	)
 16	
 17	// InitAuth 初始化认证系统
 18	func InitAuth(serviceURL string) {
 19		// 初始化CAS客户端
 20		casConfig := &auth.CASConfig{
 21			ServerURL: "https://authserver.szu.edu.cn/authserver",
 22			ServiceURL: serviceURL,
 23			LoginPath: "/login",
 24			LogoutPath: "/logout",
 25			CallbackPath: "/cas/callback",
 26		}
 27		
 28		casClient = auth.NewCASClient(casConfig)
 29		sessionManager = auth.NewSessionManager(0) // 使用默认24小时超时
 30		
 31		log.Println("CAS认证系统初始化完成")
 32		log.Printf("CAS服务器: %s", casConfig.ServerURL)
 33		log.Printf("应用服务: %s", casConfig.ServiceURL)
 34	}

 25	 console.log('检测到移动设备，启用移动端优化');

 30	 mobileTips.style.display = 'block';
 31	 }
 32	 });
 33	 }
 34	 }

 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有签领记录（管理功能）
 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}
...
 92	
 93	// ExportRecords 导出签领记录（CSV格式）
 94	func ExportRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 95		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 96		if err != nil {
 97			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 98				"code": 500,
 99				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 100			})
 101			return
 102		}
 103	
 104		// 设置CSV响应头
 105		c.Header("Content-Type", "text/csv")
 106		c.Header("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=materials_records.csv")
 107	
 108		// 写入CSV头部
 109		csvContent := "ID,工号,姓名,部门,签领时间,创建时间\n"
 110	
 111		// 写入数据
 112		for _, record := range records {
 113			csvContent += strconv.Itoa(record.ID) + "," +
 114				record.CardNumber + "," +
 115				record.Name + "," +
 116				record.Dept + "," +
 117				record.ReceivedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "," +
 118				record.CreatedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "\n"
 119		}
 120	
 121		c.String(http.StatusOK, csvContent)
 122	}

 16	// ScanQRCode 处理二维码扫描
 17	func ScanQRCode(c *gin.Context) {
 18		var req ScanQRCodeRequest
 19		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 20			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 21				"code": 400,
 22				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 23			})
 24			return
 25		}
 26	
 27		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 28	
 29		// 调用微信二维码解码接口
 30		utils.GetUserInfoFromWXiaoCode(req.QRCode, &responseData, req.DeviceID)
 31	
 32		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 33			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 34			return
 35		}
 36	
 37		// 检查是否已经领取过物资
 38		if responseData.Status == "已领取" {
 39			responseData.Msg = "您已领取过该物资，无法重复领取。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 40			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, responseData)
 41			return
 42		} else {
 43			responseData.Msg = "扫码成功！您可领取物资"
 44			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 45		}
 46	}

 67			})
 68			return

 75	
 76		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 77			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 78			return
 79		}
 80	
 81		// 检查是否已经领取过物资
 82		if responseData.HasReceived {
 83			responseData.Msg = "您已领取过该物资，无法重复领取。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 84			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 85			return
 86		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 87			responseData.Msg = "非应届毕业生，不能领取物品"
 88			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 89			return
 90		}
 91	
 92		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可领取物资"
 93		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 94	}

 233	
 234	 // 二维码检测成功回调
 235	 onQRCodeDetected(code) {
 236	 if (!this.scanning) return;
 237	 
 238	 this.stopScanning();
 239	 
 240	 // 验证是否为深圳大学二维码
 241	 if (this.isValidSZUQRCode(code)) {
 242	 // 触发扫码成功事件
 243	 const event = new CustomEvent('qrCodeScanned', {
 244	 detail: { code: code }
 245	 });
 246	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 247	 } else {
 248	 this.showError('请扫描深圳大学个人二维码');
 249	 // 重新开始扫描
 250	 setTimeout(() => {
 251	 if (this.video && this.video.srcObject) {
 252	 this.startScanning();
 253	 }
 254	 }, 2000);
 255	 }
 256	 }
 257	
 258	 // 验证是否为有效的深圳大学二维码
 259	 isValidSZUQRCode(code) {
 260	 // 这里应该实现深圳大学二维码的验证逻辑
 261	 // 例如检查二维码格式、前缀等
 262	 
 263	 // 简单示例：检查是否包含特定标识
 264	 return code && (
 265	 code.includes('szu.edu.cn') || 
 266	 code.includes('深圳大学') ||
 267	 code.length > 10 // 简单长度检查
 268	 );
 269	 }
 270	
 271	 // 显示错误信息
 272	 showError(message) {
 273	 const event = new CustomEvent('scanError', {
 274	 detail: { message: message }
 275	 });
 276	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 277	 }
 278	}

 51	
 52	// CheckIfReceived 检查用户是否已经领取过物资
 53	
 54	// UpdateReceiveRecord 更新签领记录状态
 55	func UpdateReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) error {
 56		// 先检查是否已存在
 57		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 58	
 59		if userInfo.Status == "已领取" {
 60			return fmt.Errorf("用户已领取过物资")
 61		}
 62	
 63		// 更新记录状态
 64		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET status = '已领取', received_at = NOW()
 65				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 66	
 67		_, err := DB.Exec(query, cardNumber)
 68		if err != nil {
 69			return fmt.Errorf("更新签领状态失败: %v", err)
 70		}
 71		return nil
 72	}
 73	
 74	// UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler 更新签领记录状态并记录处理人信息
 75	func UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(cardNumber, name, dept, handlerStudentID, handlerName string) error {
 76		// 先检查是否已存在
 77		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 78	
 79		if userInfo.Status == "已领取" {
 80			return fmt.Errorf("用户已领取过物资")
 81		}
 82	
 83		// 更新记录状态，包含处理人信息
 84		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET
 85					status = '已领取',
 86					name = ?,
 87					dept = ?,
 88					handleName = ?,
 89					handleStudentID = ?,
 90					received_at = NOW()
 91				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 92	
 93		_, err := DB.Exec(query, name, dept, handlerName, handlerStudentID, cardNumber)
 94		if err != nil {
 95			return fmt.Errorf("更新签领状态失败: %v", err)
 96		}
 97		return nil
 98	}
 99	
 100	// GetUserReceiveRecord 获取用户签领记录
 101	func GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) UserInfo {
 102		var userInfo UserInfo
 103	
 104		DB.QueryRow("select card_number,name,dept,status from userinfo where card_number = ? LIMIT 1", cardNumber).
 105			Scan(&userInfo.CardNumber, &userInfo.Name, &userInfo.Dept, &userInfo.Status)
 106		return userInfo
 107	}
 108	
 109	// GetAllReceiveRecords 获取所有签领记录（管理功能）
 110	func GetAllReceiveRecords() ([]UserInfo, error) {
 111		var records []UserInfo
 112		query := "SELECT * FROM userinfo ORDER BY created_at DESC"
 113		err := DB.Select(&records, query)
 114		if err != nil {
 115			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询所有记录失败: %v", err)
 116		}
 117		return records, nil
 118	}

 131	// GetUserInfoFromCardNumber 根据学工号直接查询用户信息
 132	func GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(cardNumber string, responseData *ResponseData) {
 133		// 从数据库查询用户信息
 134		userInfo := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 135	
 136		// 检查用户是否存在
 137		if userInfo.Name == "" {
 138			responseData.Code = 400
 139			responseData.Msg = "未找到该学工号对应的用户信息，请检查学工号是否正确"
 140			return
 141		}
 142	
 143		// 设置响应数据
 144		responseData.CredentialNo = cardNumber
 145		responseData.Name = userInfo.Name
 146		responseData.Dept = userInfo.Dept
 147		responseData.Status = userInfo.Status
 148		responseData.Code = 200
 149		responseData.Msg = "查询成功"
 150		responseData.PassCode = 1
 151		responseData.IsNeedHealthData = false
 152	
 153		// 检查是否已经领取过物资
 154		if userInfo.Status == "已领取" {
 155			responseData.HasReceived = true
 156		} else {
 157			responseData.HasReceived = false
 158		}
 159	
 160		return
 161	}

 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）
 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}
 33	
 34	// GetReceiveStats 获取签领统计信息
 35	func GetReceiveStats(c *gin.Context) {
 36		count, err := Mysql.GetReceiveCount()
 37		if err != nil {
 38			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 39				"code": 500,
 40				"msg": "查询统计失败",
 41				"error": err.Error(),
 42			})
 43			return
 44		}
 45	
 46		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 47			"code": 200,
 48			"msg": "查询成功",
 49			"data": gin.H{
 50				"total_received": count,
 51			},
 52		})
 53	}
 54	
 55	// GetUserRecord 获取特定用户的签领记录
 56	func GetUserRecord(c *gin.Context) {
 57		cardNumber := c.Param("cardNumber")
 58		if cardNumber == "" {
 59			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 60				"code": 400,
 61				"msg": "参数错误",
 62			})
 63			return
 64		}
 65	
 66		record := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 67		if record.Name != "" {
 68			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 69				"code": 500,
 70				"msg": "查询失败",
 71			})
 72			return
 73		}
 74	
 75		if record.Status == "" {
 76			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 77				"code": 200,
 78				"msg": "用户未签领",
 79				"data": nil,
 80				"has_received": false,
 81			})
 82			return
 83		}
 84	
 85		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 86			"code": 200,
 87			"msg": "查询成功",
 88			"data": record,
 89			"has_received": true,
 90		})
 91	}
 92	
 93	// ExportRecords 导出报道记录（CSV格式）
 94	func ExportRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 95		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 96		if err != nil {
 97			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 98				"code": 500,
 99				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 100			})
 101			return
 102		}
 103	
 104		// 设置CSV响应头
 105		c.Header("Content-Type", "text/csv")
 106		c.Header("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=freshman_registration_records.csv")
 107	
 108		// 写入CSV头部
 109		csvContent := "ID,工号,姓名,部门,报道时间,创建时间\n"
 110	
 111		// 写入数据
 112		for _, record := range records {
 113			csvContent += strconv.Itoa(record.ID) + "," +
 114				record.CardNumber + "," +
 115				record.Name + "," +
 116				record.Dept + "," +
 117				record.ReceivedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "," +
 118				record.CreatedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "\n"
 119		}
 120	
 121		c.String(http.StatusOK, csvContent)
 122	}

 54	// UpdateReceiveRecord 更新报道记录状态
 55	func UpdateReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) error {
 56		// 先检查是否已存在
 57		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 58	
 59		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 60			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 61		}
 62	
 63		// 更新记录状态
 64		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET status = '已报道', received_at = NOW()
 65				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 66	
 67		_, err := DB.Exec(query, cardNumber)
 68		if err != nil {
 69			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 70		}
 71		return nil
 72	}
 73	
 74	// UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler 更新报道记录状态并记录处理人信息
 75	func UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(cardNumber, name, dept, handlerStudentID, handlerName string) error {
 76		// 先检查是否已存在
 77		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 78	
 79		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 80			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 81		}
 82	
 83		// 更新记录状态，包含处理人信息
 84		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET
 85					status = '已报道',
 86					name = ?,
 87					dept = ?,
 88					handleName = ?,
 89					handleStudentID = ?,
 90					received_at = NOW()
 91				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 92	
 93		_, err := DB.Exec(query, name, dept, handlerName, handlerStudentID, cardNumber)
 94		if err != nil {
 95			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 96		}
 97		return nil
 98	}

 131	// GetRecentRecordsByHandler 获取指定处理人最近的签领记录
 132	func GetRecentRecordsByHandler(handlerStudentID string, limit int) ([]UserInfo, error) {
 133		var records []UserInfo
 134	
 135		// 先检查表结构，如果没有handleStudentID字段，则返回空记录
 136		query := `SELECT card_number, name, dept, sex, status, received_at, created_at
 137				 FROM userinfo
 138				 WHERE status = '已领取' AND handleStudentID = ?
 139				 ORDER BY received_at DESC
 140				 LIMIT ?`
 141	
 142		err := DB.Select(&records, query, handlerStudentID, limit)
 143		if err != nil {
 144			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人记录失败: %v", err)
 145		}
 146	
 147		// 如果没有handleStudentID字段，返回空数组（表示该用户还没有处理过任何记录）
 148		// 这是为了兼容还没有添加处理人字段的数据库
 149		return records, nil
 150	}

 159	// GetHandlerStats 获取每个处理人的核验统计信息，按数量降序排序
 160	func GetHandlerStats() ([]HandlerStats, error) {
 161		var stats []HandlerStats
 162	
 163		query := `SELECT
 164					handleStudentID,
 165					handleName,
 166					COUNT(*) as count
 167				 FROM userinfo
 168				 WHERE status = '已领取'
 169					AND handleStudentID IS NOT NULL
 170					AND handleStudentID != ''
 171					AND handleName IS NOT NULL
 172					AND handleName != ''
 173				 GROUP BY handleStudentID, handleName
 174				 ORDER BY count DESC`
 175	
 176		err := DB.Select(&stats, query)
 177		if err != nil {
 178			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人统计失败: %v", err)
 179		}
 180	
 181		return stats, nil
 182	}

 184	// Close 关闭数据库连接
 185	func Close() error {
 186		if DB != nil {
 187			return DB.Close()
 188		}
 189		return nil
 190	}

 48	// ConfirmReceiveRequest 确认签领请求结构体
 49	type ConfirmReceiveRequest struct {
 50		CardNumber string `json:"card_number" binding:"required"`
 51		Name string `json:"name"`
 52		Dept string `json:"dept"`
 53	}
 54	
 55	// ManualLookupRequest 手动查询请求结构体
 56	type ManualLookupRequest struct {
 57		CardNumber string `json:"card_number" binding:"required"`
 58	}
 59	
 60	// ManualLookup 手动查询用户信息
 61	func ManualLookup(c *gin.Context) {
 62		var req ManualLookupRequest
 63		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 64			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 65				"code": 400,
 66				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 67			})
 68			return
 69		}
 70	
 71		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 72	
 73		// 直接从数据库查询用户信息
 74		utils.GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(req.CardNumber, &responseData)
 75	
 76		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 77			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 78			return
 79		}
 80	
 81		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 82		if responseData.HasReceived {
 83			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 84			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 85			return
 86		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 87			responseData.Msg = "非新生，不能完成报道"
 88			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 89			return
 90		}
 91	
 92		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可完成报道"
 93		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 94	}
 95	
 96	// ConfirmReceive 确认物资签领
 97	func ConfirmReceive(c *gin.Context) {
 98		var req ConfirmReceiveRequest
 99		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 100			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 101				"code": 400,
 102				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 103			})
 104			return
 105		}
 106	
 107		// 获取当前登录用户信息
 108		userInterface, exists := c.Get("user")
 109		if !exists {
 110			c.JSON(http.StatusUnauthorized, gin.H{
 111				"code": 401,
 112				"msg": "用户未登录",
 113			})
 114			return
 115		}
 116	
 117		// 类型断言获取用户信息
 118		user, ok := userInterface.(*auth.CASUser)
 119		if !ok {
 120			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 121				"code": 500,
 122				"msg": "用户信息获取失败",
 123			})
 124			return
 125		}
 126	
 127		// 保存到数据库，包含处理人信息
 128		if err := utils.UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(req.CardNumber, req.Name, req.Dept, user.Username, user.Name); err != nil {
 129			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 130				"code": 500,
 131				"msg": err.Error(),
 132			})
 133			return
 134		}
 135	
 136		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 137			"code": 200,
 138			"msg": "物资签领成功！",
 139		})
 140	}

Path: utils/response.go
 1	package utils
 2	
 3	// ResponseData 通用响应结构体
 4	type ResponseData struct {
 5		Code int `json:"code"`
 6		Msg string `json:"msg"`
 7		Name string `json:"name,omitempty"`
 8		Dept string `json:"dept,omitempty"`
 9		Xgh string `json:"xgh,omitempty"`
 10		PassCode int `json:"pass_code,omitempty"`
 11		CredentialNo string `json:"credential_no,omitempty"`
 12		IsNeedHealthData bool `json:"is_need_health_data,omitempty"`
 13		HasReceived bool `json:"has_received,omitempty"`
 14		Status string `json:"status,omitempty"` // 用户状态：已领取/未领取
 15	}
 16	
 17	// WxDataRequest 微信二维码请求结构体
 18	type WxDataRequest struct {
 19		App_key string `json:"app_key"`
 20		Timestamp string `json:"timestamp"`
 21		Nonce string `json:"nonce"`
 22		Signature string `json:"signature"`
 23		School_code string `json:"school_code"`
 24		Auth_code string `json:"auth_code"`
 25		Scene string `json:"scene"`
 26		Device_no string `json:"device_no"`
 27		Location string `json:"location"`
 28	}
 29	
 30	// WxDataResponse 微信二维码响应结构体
 31	type WxDataResponse struct {
 32		Code int `json:"code"`
 33		Message string `json:"message"`
 34		User struct {
 35			Card_number string `json:"card_number"`
 36			Identity_type string `json:"identity_type"`
 37			Name string `json:"name"`
 38		} `json:"user"`
 39	}
 40	
 41	// MaterialReceiveRecord 物资签领记录
 42	type MaterialReceiveRecord struct {
 43		ID int `json:"id" gorm:"primaryKey"`
 44		CardNumber string `json:"card_number" gorm:"uniqueIndex"`
 45		Name string `json:"name"`
 46		Dept string `json:"dept"`
 47		ReceivedAt string `json:"received_at"`
 48		CreatedAt string `json:"created_at"`
 49	}

 59	
 60	// ManualLookup 手动查询用户信息
 61	func ManualLookup(c *gin.Context) {
 62		var req ManualLookupRequest
 63		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 64			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 65				"code": 400,
 66				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 67			})
 68			return
 69		}
 70	
 71		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 72	
 73		// 直接从数据库查询用户信息
 74		utils.GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(req.CardNumber, &responseData)
 75	
 76		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 77			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 78			return
 79		}
 80	
 81		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 82		if responseData.HasReceived {
 83			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 84			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 85			return
 86		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 87			responseData.Msg = "非新生，不能完成报道"
 88			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 89			return
 90		}
 91	
 92		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可完成报道"
 93		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 94	}

 235	 onQRCodeDetected(code) {

 237	 
 238	 this.stopScanning();
 239

 241	 if (this.isValidSZUQRCode(code)) {
 242	 // 触发扫码成功事件

 245	 });

 247	 } else {

 251	 if (this.video && this.video.srcObject) {
 252	 this.startScanning();
 253	 }
 254	 }, 2000);
 255	 }
 256	 }

 22			})

 24		}

 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{

 28			"msg": "查询成功",

 30			"total": len(records),

 92	
 93	// ExportRecords 导出报道记录（CSV格式）
 94	func ExportRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 95		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 96		if err != nil {
 97			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 98				"code": 500,
 99				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 100			})
 101			return
 102		}
 103	
 104		// 设置CSV响应头
 105		c.Header("Content-Type", "text/csv")
 106		c.Header("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=freshman_registration_records.csv")
 107	
 108		// 写入CSV头部
 109		csvContent := "ID,工号,姓名,部门,报道时间,创建时间\n"
 110	
 111		// 写入数据
 112		for _, record := range records {
 113			csvContent += strconv.Itoa(record.ID) + "," +
 114				record.CardNumber + "," +
 115				record.Name + "," +
 116				record.Dept + "," +
 117				record.ReceivedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "," +
 118				record.CreatedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "\n"
 119		}
 120	
 121		c.String(http.StatusOK, csvContent)
 122	}

 124	// GetMyRecentRecords 获取当前登录用户最近核验的记录
 125	func GetMyRecentRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 126		// 获取当前登录用户信息
 127		userInterface, exists := c.Get("user")
 128		if !exists {
 129			c.JSON(http.StatusUnauthorized, gin.H{
 130				"code": 401,
 131				"msg": "用户未登录",
 132			})
 133			return
 134		}
 135	
 136		// 类型断言获取用户信息
 137		user, ok := userInterface.(*auth.CASUser)
 138		if !ok {
 139			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 140				"code": 500,
 141				"msg": "用户信息获取失败",
 142			})
 143			return
 144		}
 145	
 146		// 获取该用户最近核验的10条记录
 147		records, err := Mysql.GetRecentRecordsByHandler(user.Username, 10)
 148		if err != nil {
 149			log.Printf("查询用户 %s 的最近记录失败: %v", user.Username, err)
 150			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 151				"code": 500,
 152				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 153				"error": err.Error(),
 154			})
 155			return
 156		}
 157	
 158		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 159			"code": 200,
 160			"msg": "查询成功",
 161			"data": records,
 162			"total": len(records),
 163		})
 164	}

 51	
 52	// CheckIfReceived 检查用户是否已经完成报道
 53	
 54	// UpdateReceiveRecord 更新报道记录状态
 55	func UpdateReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) error {
 56		// 先检查是否已存在
 57		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 58	
 59		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 60			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 61		}
 62	
 63		// 更新记录状态
 64		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET status = '已报道', received_at = NOW()
 65				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 66	
 67		_, err := DB.Exec(query, cardNumber)
 68		if err != nil {
 69			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 70		}
 71		return nil
 72	}
 73	
 74	// UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler 更新报道记录状态并记录处理人信息
 75	func UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(cardNumber, name, dept, handlerStudentID, handlerName string) error {
 76		// 先检查是否已存在
 77		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 78	
 79		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 80			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 81		}
 82	
 83		// 更新记录状态，包含处理人信息
 84		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET
 85					status = '已报道',
 86					name = ?,
 87					dept = ?,
 88					handleName = ?,
 89					handleStudentID = ?,
 90					received_at = NOW()
 91				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 92	
 93		_, err := DB.Exec(query, name, dept, handlerName, handlerStudentID, cardNumber)
 94		if err != nil {
 95			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 96		}
 97		return nil
 98	}

 119	
 120	// GetReceiveCount 获取签领总数
 121	func GetReceiveCount() (int, error) {
 122		var count int
 123		query := "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo"
 124		err := DB.Get(&count, query)
 125		if err != nil {
 126			return 0, fmt.Errorf("查询签领总数失败: %v", err)
 127		}
 128		return count, nil
 129	}
 130	
 131	// GetRecentRecordsByHandler 获取指定处理人最近的报道记录
 132	func GetRecentRecordsByHandler(handlerStudentID string, limit int) ([]UserInfo, error) {
 133		var records []UserInfo
 134	
 135		// 先检查表结构，如果没有handleStudentID字段，则返回空记录
 136		query := `SELECT card_number, name, dept, sex, status, received_at, created_at
 137				 FROM userinfo
 138				 WHERE status = '已报道' AND handleStudentID = ?
 139				 ORDER BY received_at DESC
 140				 LIMIT ?`
 141	
 142		err := DB.Select(&records, query, handlerStudentID, limit)
 143		if err != nil {
 144			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人记录失败: %v", err)
 145		}
 146	
 147		// 如果没有handleStudentID字段，返回空数组（表示该用户还没有处理过任何记录）
 148		// 这是为了兼容还没有添加处理人字段的数据库
 149		return records, nil
 150	}

 325	 // 导出数据
 326	 exportData() {
 327	 if (this.statsData.length === 0) {
 328	 this.showError('暂无数据可导出');
 329	 return;
 330	 }
 331	
 332	 // 创建CSV内容
 333	 const headers = ['排名', '姓名', '学工号', '核验数量', '占比'];
 334	 const totalRecords = this.statsData.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0);
 335	 
 336	 const csvContent = [
 337	 headers.join(','),
 338	 ...this.statsData.map((item, index) => {
 339	 const rank = index + 1;
 340	 const percentage = totalRecords > 0 ? ((item.count / totalRecords) * 100).toFixed(1) : '0.0';
 341	 return [rank, item.handle_name, item.handle_student_id, item.count, percentage + '%'].join(',');
 342	 })
 343	 ].join('\n');

 90	 displayRecentRecords(records) {
 91	 const recordsList = document.getElementById('recentRecordsList');
 92	
 93	 if (!recordsList) return;
 94	
 95	 if (!records || records.length === 0) {
 96	 recordsList.innerHTML = '<div class="no-records">暂无报道记录</div>';
 97	 return;

 102	 const receivedTime = new Date(record.received_at).toLocaleString('zh-CN', {
 103	 month: '2-digit',
 104	 day: '2-digit',
 105	 hour: '2-digit',
 106	 minute: '2-digit'
 107	 });
 108	
 109	 html += `
 110	 <div class="record-item">
 111	 <div class="record-name">${record.name}</div>
 112	 <div class="record-dept">${record.dept || '未知部门'}</div>
 113	 <div class="record-time">${receivedTime}</div>
 114	 </div>
 115	 `;
 116	 });
 117	
 118	 recordsList.innerHTML = html;
 119	 console.log('最近记录显示成功:', records);
 120	 }

 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）
 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}
 33	
 34	// GetReceiveStats 获取报道统计信息
 35	func GetReceiveStats(c *gin.Context) {
 36		count, err := Mysql.GetReceiveCount()
 37		if err != nil {
 38			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 39				"code": 500,
 40				"msg": "查询统计失败",
 41				"error": err.Error(),
 42			})
 43			return
 44		}
 45	
 46		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 47			"code": 200,
 48			"msg": "查询成功",
 49			"data": gin.H{
 50				"total_received": count,
 51			},
 52		})
 53	}
 54	
 55	// GetUserRecord 获取特定用户的报道记录
 56	func GetUserRecord(c *gin.Context) {
 57		cardNumber := c.Param("cardNumber")
 58		if cardNumber == "" {
 59			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 60				"code": 400,
 61				"msg": "参数错误",
 62			})
 63			return
 64		}
 65	
 66		record := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 67		if record.Name != "" {
 68			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 69				"code": 500,
 70				"msg": "查询失败",
 71			})
 72			return
 73		}
 74	
 75		if record.Status == "" {
 76			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 77				"code": 200,
 78				"msg": "用户未报道",
 79				"data": nil,
 80				"has_received": false,
 81			})
 82			return
 83		}
 84	
 85		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 86			"code": 200,
 87			"msg": "查询成功",
 88			"data": record,
 89			"has_received": true,
 90		})
 91	}

 125	func GetMyRecentRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 126		// 获取当前登录用户信息
 127		userInterface, exists := c.Get("user")
 128		if !exists {
 129			c.JSON(http.StatusUnauthorized, gin.H{
 130				"code": 401,
 131				"msg": "用户未登录",
 132			})
 133			return
 134		}
 135	
 136		// 类型断言获取用户信息
 137		user, ok := userInterface.(*auth.CASUser)
 138		if !ok {
 139			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 140				"code": 500,
 141				"msg": "用户信息获取失败",
 142			})
 143			return
 144		}
 145	
 146		// 获取该用户最近报道的10条记录
 147		records, err := Mysql.GetRecentRecordsByHandler(user.Username, 10)
 148		if err != nil {
 149			log.Printf("查询用户 %s 的最近记录失败: %v", user.Username, err)
 150			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 151				"code": 500,
 152				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 153				"error": err.Error(),
 154			})
 155			return
 156		}
 157	
 158		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 159			"code": 200,
 160			"msg": "查询成功",
 161			"data": records,
 162			"total": len(records),
 163		})
 164	}

 18	
 19	// ScanQRCode 处理二维码扫描
 20	func ScanQRCode(c *gin.Context) {
 21		var req ScanQRCodeRequest
 22		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 23			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 24				"code": 400,
 25				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 26			})
 27			return
 28		}
 29	
 30		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 31	
 32		// 调用微信二维码解码接口
 33		utils.GetUserInfoFromWXiaoCode(req.QRCode, &responseData, req.DeviceID)
 34	
 35		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 36			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 37			return
 38		}
 39	
 40		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 41		if responseData.Status == "已报道" {
 42			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 43			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, responseData)
 44			return
 45		} else {

 69				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 70			})

 78

 80			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 81			return
 82		}
 83	
 84		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 85		if responseData.HasReceived {
 86			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 87			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 88			return
 89		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 90			responseData.Msg = "非新生，不能完成报道"
 91			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 92			return
 93		}
 94	
 95		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可完成报道"
 96		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 97	}

 145	func SentMessageToYIQing(searchData string) {
 146		//发送消息致电子哨兵后台
 147		url := "http://210.39.8.33:5024/GetUserInfo"
 148		client := &http.Client{}
 149	
 150		Body := `{"deviceId":"志愿者扫码","idcard":"","name":"","searchData":"` + searchData + `","type":3,"wlkh":"","wxCode":""}`
 151	
 152		reader := bytes.NewReader([]byte(Body))
 153		req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", url, reader)
 154		if err != nil {
 155			fmt.Println(err)
 156			return
 157		}
 158		req.Header["Content-Type"] = []string{"application/json"}
 159		resp, err := client.Do(req)
 160		defer resp.Body.Close()
 161		body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
 162		fmt.Println("body", string(body))
 163	}

 131	// GetUserInfoFromCardNumber 根据学工号直接查询用户信息
 132	func GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(cardNumber string, responseData *ResponseData) {
 133		// 从数据库查询用户信息
 134		userInfo := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 135	
 136		// 检查用户是否存在
 137		if userInfo.Name == "" {
 138			responseData.Code = 400
 139			responseData.Msg = "未找到该学工号对应的用户信息，请检查学工号是否正确"
 140			return
 141		}
 142	
 143		// 设置响应数据
 144		responseData.CredentialNo = cardNumber
 145		responseData.Name = userInfo.Name
 146		responseData.Dept = userInfo.Dept
 147		responseData.Status = userInfo.Status
 148		responseData.Code = 200
 149		responseData.Msg = "查询成功"
 150		responseData.PassCode = 1
 151		responseData.IsNeedHealthData = false
 152	
 153		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 154		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 155			responseData.HasReceived = true
 156		} else {
 157			responseData.HasReceived = false
 158		}
 159	
 160		return
 161	}

 100	// GetUserReceiveRecord 获取用户报道记录
 101	func GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) UserInfo {
 102		var userInfo UserInfo
 103	
 104		DB.QueryRow("select card_number,name,dept,status from userinfo where card_number = ? LIMIT 1", cardNumber).
 105			Scan(&userInfo.CardNumber, &userInfo.Name, &userInfo.Dept, &userInfo.Status)
 106		return userInfo
 107	}

 109	// GetAllReceiveRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）
 110	func GetAllReceiveRecords() ([]UserInfo, error) {
 111		var records []UserInfo
 112		query := "SELECT * FROM userinfo ORDER BY created_at DESC"
 113		err := DB.Select(&records, query)
 114		if err != nil {
 115			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询所有记录失败: %v", err)
 116		}
 117		return records, nil
 118	}

 130	
 131	// GetRecentRecordsByHandler 获取指定处理人最近的报道记录
 132	func GetRecentRecordsByHandler(handlerStudentID string, limit int) ([]UserInfo, error) {
 133		var records []UserInfo
 134	
 135		// 先检查表结构，如果没有handleStudentID字段，则返回空记录
 136		query := `SELECT card_number, name, dept, sex, status, received_at, created_at
 137				 FROM userinfo
 138				 WHERE status = '已报道' AND handleStudentID = ?
 139				 ORDER BY received_at DESC
 140				 LIMIT ?`
 141	
 142		err := DB.Select(&records, query, handlerStudentID, limit)
 143		if err != nil {
 144			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人记录失败: %v", err)
 145		}
 146	
 147		// 如果没有handleStudentID字段，返回空数组（表示该用户还没有处理过任何记录）
 148		// 这是为了兼容还没有添加处理人字段的数据库
 149		return records, nil
 150	}

 158	
 159	// GetHandlerStats 获取每个处理人的报道统计信息，按数量降序排序
 160	func GetHandlerStats() ([]HandlerStats, error) {
 161		var stats []HandlerStats
 162	
 163		query := `SELECT
 164					handleStudentID,
 165					handleName,
 166					COUNT(*) as count
 167				 FROM userinfo
 168				 WHERE status = '已报道'
 169					AND handleStudentID IS NOT NULL
 170					AND handleStudentID != ''
 171					AND handleName IS NOT NULL
 172					AND handleName != ''
 173				 GROUP BY handleStudentID, handleName
 174				 ORDER BY count DESC`
 175	
 176		err := DB.Select(&stats, query)
 177		if err != nil {
 178			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人统计失败: %v", err)
 179		}
 180	
 181		return stats, nil
 182	}
 183	
 184	// Close 关闭数据库连接
 185	func Close() error {
 186		if DB != nil {
 187			return DB.Close()
 188		}
 189		return nil
 190	}

 233	
 234	 // 二维码检测成功回调
 235	 onQRCodeDetected(code) {
 236	 if (!this.scanning) return;
 237	 
 238	 this.stopScanning();
 239	 
 240	 // 验证是否为深圳大学二维码
 241	 if (this.isValidSZUQRCode(code)) {
 242	 // 触发扫码成功事件
 243	 const event = new CustomEvent('qrCodeScanned', {
 244	 detail: { code: code }
 245	 });
 246	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 247	 } else {
 248	 this.showError('请扫描深圳大学个人二维码');
 249	 // 重新开始扫描
 250	 setTimeout(() => {
 251	 if (this.video && this.video.srcObject) {
 252	 this.startScanning();
 253	 }
 254	 }, 2000);
 255	 }
 256	 }
 257	
 258	 // 验证是否为有效的深圳大学二维码
 259	 isValidSZUQRCode(code) {
 260	 // 这里应该实现深圳大学二维码的验证逻辑
 261	 // 例如检查二维码格式、前缀等
 262	 
 263	 // 简单示例：检查是否包含特定标识
 264	 return code && (
 265	 code.includes('szu.edu.cn') || 
 266	 code.includes('深圳大学') ||
 267	 code.length > 10 // 简单长度检查
 268	 );
 269	 }
 270	
 271	 // 显示错误信息
 272	 showError(message) {
 273	 const event = new CustomEvent('scanError', {
 274	 detail: { message: message }
 275	 });
 276	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 277	 }
 278	}

 73	
 74	 // 加载统计数据
 75	 async loadStatsData() {
 76	 this.showLoading();
 77	 
 78	 try {
 79	 const response = await fetch('/api/admin/handler-stats');
 80	 const data = await response.json();
 81	 
 82	 if (data.code === 200) {
 83	 this.statsData = data.data || [];
 84	 this.renderStatsOverview();
 85	 this.renderRankingList();
 86	 this.renderStatsTable();
 87	 this.renderCharts();
 88	 } else {
 89	 this.showError(data.msg || '加载统计数据失败');
 90	 }
 91	 } catch (error) {
 92	 console.error('加载统计数据失败:', error);
 93	 this.showError('网络错误，请检查网络连接');
 94	 } finally {
 95	 this.hideLoading();
 96	 }
 97	 }
 98	
 99	 // 渲染统计概览
 100	 renderStatsOverview() {
 101	 const totalHandlers = this.statsData.length;
 102	 const totalRecords = this.statsData.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0);
 103	 const avgRecords = totalHandlers > 0 ? Math.round(totalRecords / totalHandlers) : 0;
 104	
 105	 document.getElementById('totalHandlers').textContent = totalHandlers;
 106	 document.getElementById('totalRecords').textContent = totalRecords;
 107	 document.getElementById('avgRecords').textContent = avgRecords;
 108	 }
 109	
 110	 // 渲染排行榜列表
 111	 renderRankingList() {
 112	 const container = document.getElementById('rankingList');
 113	 
 114	 if (this.statsData.length === 0) {
 115	 container.innerHTML = '<div class="loading-placeholder">暂无统计数据</div>';
 116	 return;
 117	 }

 89	 // 显示最近报道记录
 90	 displayRecentRecords(records) {
 91	 const recordsList = document.getElementById('recentRecordsList');
 92	
 93	 if (!recordsList) return;
 94	
 95	 if (!records || records.length === 0) {
 96	 recordsList.innerHTML = '<div class="no-records">暂无报道记录</div>';
 97	 return;
 98	 }
 99	
 100	 let html = '';
 101	 records.forEach(record => {
 102	 const receivedTime = new Date(record.received_at).toLocaleString('zh-CN', {
 103	 month: '2-digit',
 104	 day: '2-digit',
 105	 hour: '2-digit',
 106	 minute: '2-digit'
 107	 });
 108	
 109	 html += `
 110	 <div class="record-item">
 111	 <div class="record-name">${record.name}</div>
 112	 <div class="record-dept">${record.dept || '未知部门'}</div>
 113	 <div class="record-time">${receivedTime}</div>
 114	 </div>
 115	 `;
 116	 });
 117	
 118	 recordsList.innerHTML = html;
 119	 console.log('最近记录显示成功:', records);
 120	 }

 566	 getDeviceId() {
 567	 let deviceId = localStorage.getItem('deviceId');
 568	 if (!deviceId) {
 569	 deviceId = 'device-' + Date.now() + '-' + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9);
 570	 localStorage.setItem('deviceId', deviceId);
 571	 }
 572	 return deviceId;
 573	 }

 145	func SentMessageToYIQing(searchData string) {
 146		//发送消息致电子哨兵后台
 147		url := "http://210.39.8.33:5024/GetUserInfo"
 148		client := &http.Client{}
 149	
 150		Body := `{"deviceId":"志愿者扫码","idcard":"","name":"","searchData":"` + searchData + `","type":3,"wlkh":"","wxCode":""}`
 151	
 152		reader := bytes.NewReader([]byte(Body))
 153		req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", url, reader)
 154		if err != nil {
 155			fmt.Println(err)
 156			return
 157		}
 158		req.Header["Content-Type"] = []string{"application/json"}
 159		resp, err := client.Do(req)
 160		defer resp.Body.Close()
 161		body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
 162		fmt.Println("body", string(body))
 163	}

 235	 onQRCodeDetected(code) {

## 问题分析和解决方案

您遇到的问题是查询结果页面仍然显示"您可领取物资"，这是由于**浏览器缓存**导致的。虽然我们已经修改了所有相关的代码，但浏览器仍在使用缓存的旧版本JavaScript文件。

## 已完成的修改

### 1. 更新了静态文件版本号
- `static/index.html`: JavaScript和CSS文件版本号从`v=20250618`更新为`v=20250829`
- `static/stats.html`: CSS和JavaScript文件版本号更新为`v=20250829`

### 2. 确认所有相关代码已正确修改
- **前端JavaScript** (`static/js/app.js`): 第462行显示"您可完成报道"
- **后端API** (`handlers/qrcode.go`): 
 - 扫码API返回"扫码成功！您可完成报道"
 - 手动查询API返回"查询成功！您可完成报道"

## 解决步骤

1. **清除浏览器缓存**：
 - 在浏览器中按 `Ctrl+F5` (Windows) 或 `Cmd+Shift+R` (Mac) 强制刷新
 - 或者在开发者工具中右键刷新按钮选择"清空缓存并硬性重新加载"

2. **重新访问页面**：
 - 由于我们更新了版本号，浏览器会自动下载新的JavaScript和CSS文件

现在当您重新访问页面并进行查询时，应该会显示正确的文本"您可完成报道"而不是"您可领取物资"。

如果问题仍然存在，请尝试：
1. 完全关闭浏览器后重新打开
2. 使用无痕/隐私模式访问
3. 检查服务器是否已重启以加载最新的后端代码

","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"我运行程序打包命令报错，go build main.go，# command-line-arguments"},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":".\main.go:17:12: undefined: GetConfig"},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]}]},"mentioned_items":[],"structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":0,"content":"这个错误是因为 `GetConfig` 函数定义在 `config.go` 文件中，但是您只编译了 `main.go` 文件。在 Go 语言中，当您有多个 `.go` 文件在同一个包中时，需要一起编译它们。

## 解决方案

有几种方法可以解决这个问题：

### 方法1：编译整个包（推荐）
```bash
go build .
```
或者
```bash
go build
```

这会编译当前目录下所有的 `.go` 文件。

### 方法2：指定所有相关的 Go 文件
```bash
go build main.go config.go
```

### 方法3：使用 go run 运行（开发测试时）
```bash
go run .
```

## 推荐的打包命令

由于您的项目是一个完整的 Go 模块，建议使用以下命令：

```bash
# 编译生成可执行文件
go build -o materials.exe .

# 或者如果要交叉编译为 Windows 可执行文件
GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o materials.exe .
```

## 检查项目结构

确保您的项目结构正确：
```
materials/
├── main.go
├── config.go
├── go.mod
├── go.sum
├── handlers/
├── utils/
├── Mysql/
├── auth/
└── static/
```

## 如果仍有问题

1. **确保在正确的目录中**：确保您在包含 `go.mod` 文件的根目录中运行命令

2. **检查 go.mod 文件**：确保模块名称正确
 ```go
 module materials
 ```

3. **清理并重新构建**：
 ```bash
 go clean
 go mod tidy
 go build .
 ```

使用 `go build .` 命令应该能够成功编译您的项目并生成可执行文件。

 30	func GetWeworkConfig(c *gin.Context) {
 31		// 企业微信配置信息
 32		config := WeworkConfig{
 33			CorpID: "ww563e8adbd544adf5", // 替换为你的企业ID

 37			NonceStr: generateNonceStr(),
 38		}
 39	
 40		// 获取jsapi_ticket
 41		jsapiTicket, err := utils.GetJsapiTicket()
 42		if err != nil {
 43			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 44				"code": 500,
 45				"msg": "获取jsapi_ticket失败",
 46				"error": err.Error(),
 47			})
 48			return
 49		}
 50	
 51		// 生成签名
 52		config.Signature = generateSignature(jsapiTicket, config.NonceStr, config.Timestamp, getCurrentURL(c))
 53	
 54		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 55			"code": 200,
 56			"msg": "success",
 57			"data": config,
 58		})
 59	}

 61	// 生成随机字符串
 62	func generateNonceStr() string {
 63		const charset = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789"
 64		b := make([]byte, 16)
 65		for i := range b {
 66			b[i] = charset[rand.Intn(len(charset))]
 67		}
 68		return string(b)
 69	}

 25

 27		r := gin.Default()
 28	
 29		// 认证路由（不需要认证）
 30		r.GET("/login", handlers.Login)
 31		r.GET("/logout", handlers.Logout)
 32		r.GET("/cas/callback", handlers.CASCallback)
 33	
 34		// 应用认证中间件
 35		r.Use(handlers.AuthMiddleware())
 36

 38		r.Static("/static", "./static")

 16	
 17	// InitAuth 初始化认证系统
 18	func InitAuth(serviceURL string) {
 19		// 初始化CAS客户端
 20		casConfig := &auth.CASConfig{
 21			ServerURL: "https://authserver.szu.edu.cn/authserver",
 22			ServiceURL: serviceURL,
 23			LoginPath: "/login",
 24			LogoutPath: "/logout",
 25			CallbackPath: "/cas/callback",
 26		}
 27		
 28		casClient = auth.NewCASClient(casConfig)
 29		sessionManager = auth.NewSessionManager(0) // 使用默认24小时超时
 30		
 31		log.Println("CAS认证系统初始化完成")
 32		log.Printf("CAS服务器: %s", casConfig.ServerURL)
 33		log.Printf("应用服务: %s", casConfig.ServiceURL)
 34	}

 25	 console.log('检测到移动设备，启用移动端优化');
 26	 // 显示移动端提示
 27	 document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
 28	 const mobileTips = document.getElementById('mobileTips');
 29	 if (mobileTips) {
 30	 mobileTips.style.display = 'block';
 31	 }
 32	 });
 33	 }
 34	 }

 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有签领记录（管理功能）
 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}
...
 92	
 93	// ExportRecords 导出签领记录（CSV格式）
 94	func ExportRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 95		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 96		if err != nil {
 97			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 98				"code": 500,
 99				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 100			})
 101			return
 102		}
 103	
 104		// 设置CSV响应头
 105		c.Header("Content-Type", "text/csv")
 106		c.Header("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=materials_records.csv")
 107	
 108		// 写入CSV头部
 109		csvContent := "ID,工号,姓名,部门,签领时间,创建时间\n"
 110	
 111		// 写入数据
 112		for _, record := range records {
 113			csvContent += strconv.Itoa(record.ID) + "," +
 114				record.CardNumber + "," +
 115				record.Name + "," +
 116				record.Dept + "," +
 117				record.ReceivedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "," +
 118				record.CreatedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "\n"
 119		}
 120	
 121		c.String(http.StatusOK, csvContent)
 122	}

 16	// ScanQRCode 处理二维码扫描
 17	func ScanQRCode(c *gin.Context) {
 18		var req ScanQRCodeRequest
 19		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 20			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 21				"code": 400,
 22				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 23			})
 24			return
 25		}
 26	
 27		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 28	
 29		// 调用微信二维码解码接口
 30		utils.GetUserInfoFromWXiaoCode(req.QRCode, &responseData, req.DeviceID)
 31	
 32		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 33			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 34			return
 35		}
 36	
 37		// 检查是否已经领取过物资
 38		if responseData.Status == "已领取" {
 39			responseData.Msg = "您已领取过该物资，无法重复领取。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 40			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, responseData)
 41			return
 42		} else {
 43			responseData.Msg = "扫码成功！您可领取物资"
 44			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 45		}
 46	}

 60	// ManualLookup 手动查询用户信息
 61	func ManualLookup(c *gin.Context) {
 62		var req ManualLookupRequest
 63		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 64			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 65				"code": 400,
 66				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 67			})
 68			return
 69		}
 70	
 71		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 72	
 73		// 直接从数据库查询用户信息
 74		utils.GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(req.CardNumber, &responseData)
 75	
 76		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 77			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 78			return
 79		}
 80	
 81		// 检查是否已经领取过物资
 82		if responseData.HasReceived {
 83			responseData.Msg = "您已领取过该物资，无法重复领取。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 84			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 85			return
 86		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 87			responseData.Msg = "非应届毕业生，不能领取物品"
 88			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 89			return
 90		}
 91	
 92		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可领取物资"
 93		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 94	}

 233	
 234	 // 二维码检测成功回调
 235	 onQRCodeDetected(code) {
 236	 if (!this.scanning) return;
 237	 
 238	 this.stopScanning();
 239	 
 240	 // 验证是否为深圳大学二维码
 241	 if (this.isValidSZUQRCode(code)) {
 242	 // 触发扫码成功事件
 243	 const event = new CustomEvent('qrCodeScanned', {
 244	 detail: { code: code }
 245	 });
 246	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 247	 } else {
 248	 this.showError('请扫描深圳大学个人二维码');
 249	 // 重新开始扫描
 250	 setTimeout(() => {
 251	 if (this.video && this.video.srcObject) {
 252	 this.startScanning();
 253	 }
 254	 }, 2000);
 255	 }
 256	 }
 257	
 258	 // 验证是否为有效的深圳大学二维码
 259	 isValidSZUQRCode(code) {
 260	 // 这里应该实现深圳大学二维码的验证逻辑
 261	 // 例如检查二维码格式、前缀等
 262	 
 263	 // 简单示例：检查是否包含特定标识
 264	 return code && (
 265	 code.includes('szu.edu.cn') || 
 266	 code.includes('深圳大学') ||
 267	 code.length > 10 // 简单长度检查
 268	 );
 269	 }
 270	
 271	 // 显示错误信息
 272	 showError(message) {
 273	 const event = new CustomEvent('scanError', {
 274	 detail: { message: message }
 275	 });
 276	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 277	 }
 278	}

 54	// UpdateReceiveRecord 更新签领记录状态
 55	func UpdateReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) error {
 56		// 先检查是否已存在
 57		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 58	
 59		if userInfo.Status == "已领取" {
 60			return fmt.Errorf("用户已领取过物资")
 61		}
 62	
 63		// 更新记录状态
 64		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET status = '已领取', received_at = NOW()
 65				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 66	
 67		_, err := DB.Exec(query, cardNumber)
 68		if err != nil {
 69			return fmt.Errorf("更新签领状态失败: %v", err)
 70		}
 71		return nil
 72	}
 73	
 74	// UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler 更新签领记录状态并记录处理人信息
 75	func UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(cardNumber, name, dept, handlerStudentID, handlerName string) error {
 76		// 先检查是否已存在
 77		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 78	
 79		if userInfo.Status == "已领取" {
 80			return fmt.Errorf("用户已领取过物资")
 81		}
 82	
 83		// 更新记录状态，包含处理人信息
 84		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET
 85					status = '已领取',
 86					name = ?,
 87					dept = ?,
 88					handleName = ?,
 89					handleStudentID = ?,
 90					received_at = NOW()
 91				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 92	
 93		_, err := DB.Exec(query, name, dept, handlerName, handlerStudentID, cardNumber)
 94		if err != nil {
 95			return fmt.Errorf("更新签领状态失败: %v", err)
 96		}
 97		return nil
 98	}
 99	
 100	// GetUserReceiveRecord 获取用户签领记录
 101	func GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) UserInfo {
 102		var userInfo UserInfo
 103	
 104		DB.QueryRow("select card_number,name,dept,status from userinfo where card_number = ? LIMIT 1", cardNumber).
 105			Scan(&userInfo.CardNumber, &userInfo.Name, &userInfo.Dept, &userInfo.Status)
 106		return userInfo
 107	}
 108	
 109	// GetAllReceiveRecords 获取所有签领记录（管理功能）
 110	func GetAllReceiveRecords() ([]UserInfo, error) {
 111		var records []UserInfo
 112		query := "SELECT * FROM userinfo ORDER BY created_at DESC"
 113		err := DB.Select(&records, query)
 114		if err != nil {
 115			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询所有记录失败: %v", err)
 116		}
 117		return records, nil
 118	}

 131	// GetUserInfoFromCardNumber 根据学工号直接查询用户信息
 132	func GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(cardNumber string, responseData *ResponseData) {
 133		// 从数据库查询用户信息
 134		userInfo := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 135	
 136		// 检查用户是否存在
 137		if userInfo.Name == "" {
 138			responseData.Code = 400
 139			responseData.Msg = "未找到该学工号对应的用户信息，请检查学工号是否正确"
 140			return
 141		}
 142	
 143		// 设置响应数据
 144		responseData.CredentialNo = cardNumber
 145		responseData.Name = userInfo.Name
 146		responseData.Dept = userInfo.Dept
 147		responseData.Status = userInfo.Status
 148		responseData.Code = 200
 149		responseData.Msg = "查询成功"
 150		responseData.PassCode = 1
 151		responseData.IsNeedHealthData = false
 152	
 153		// 检查是否已经领取过物资
 154		if userInfo.Status == "已领取" {
 155			responseData.HasReceived = true
 156		} else {
 157			responseData.HasReceived = false
 158		}
 159	
 160		return
 161	}

 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）
 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}
 33	
 34	// GetReceiveStats 获取签领统计信息
 35	func GetReceiveStats(c *gin.Context) {
 36		count, err := Mysql.GetReceiveCount()
 37		if err != nil {
 38			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 39				"code": 500,
 40				"msg": "查询统计失败",
 41				"error": err.Error(),
 42			})
 43			return
 44		}
 45	
 46		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 47			"code": 200,
 48			"msg": "查询成功",
 49			"data": gin.H{
 50				"total_received": count,
 51			},
 52		})
 53	}
 54	
 55	// GetUserRecord 获取特定用户的签领记录
 56	func GetUserRecord(c *gin.Context) {
 57		cardNumber := c.Param("cardNumber")
 58		if cardNumber == "" {
 59			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 60				"code": 400,
 61				"msg": "参数错误",
 62			})
 63			return
 64		}
 65	
 66		record := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 67		if record.Name != "" {
 68			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 69				"code": 500,
 70				"msg": "查询失败",
 71			})
 72			return
 73		}
 74	
 75		if record.Status == "" {
 76			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 77				"code": 200,
 78				"msg": "用户未签领",
 79				"data": nil,
 80				"has_received": false,
 81			})
 82			return
 83		}
 84	
 85		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 86			"code": 200,
 87			"msg": "查询成功",
 88			"data": record,
 89			"has_received": true,
 90		})
 91	}
 92	
 93	// ExportRecords 导出报道记录（CSV格式）
 94	func ExportRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 95		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 96		if err != nil {
 97			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 98				"code": 500,
 99				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 100			})
 101			return
 102		}
 103	
 104		// 设置CSV响应头
 105		c.Header("Content-Type", "text/csv")
 106		c.Header("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=freshman_registration_records.csv")
 107	
 108		// 写入CSV头部
 109		csvContent := "ID,工号,姓名,部门,报道时间,创建时间\n"
 110	
 111		// 写入数据
 112		for _, record := range records {
 113			csvContent += strconv.Itoa(record.ID) + "," +
 114				record.CardNumber + "," +
 115				record.Name + "," +
 116				record.Dept + "," +
 117				record.ReceivedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "," +
 118				record.CreatedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "\n"
 119		}
 120	
 121		c.String(http.StatusOK, csvContent)
 122	}

 54	// UpdateReceiveRecord 更新报道记录状态
 55	func UpdateReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) error {
 56		// 先检查是否已存在
 57		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 58	
 59		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 60			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 61		}
 62	
 63		// 更新记录状态
 64		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET status = '已报道', received_at = NOW()
 65				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 66	
 67		_, err := DB.Exec(query, cardNumber)
 68		if err != nil {
 69			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 70		}
 71		return nil
 72	}
 73	
 74	// UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler 更新报道记录状态并记录处理人信息
 75	func UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(cardNumber, name, dept, handlerStudentID, handlerName string) error {
 76		// 先检查是否已存在
 77		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 78	
 79		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 80			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 81		}
 82	
 83		// 更新记录状态，包含处理人信息
 84		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET
 85					status = '已报道',
 86					name = ?,
 87					dept = ?,
 88					handleName = ?,
 89					handleStudentID = ?,
 90					received_at = NOW()
 91				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 92	
 93		_, err := DB.Exec(query, name, dept, handlerName, handlerStudentID, cardNumber)
 94		if err != nil {
 95			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 96		}
 97		return nil
 98	}

 131	// GetRecentRecordsByHandler 获取指定处理人最近的签领记录
 132	func GetRecentRecordsByHandler(handlerStudentID string, limit int) ([]UserInfo, error) {
 133		var records []UserInfo
 134	
 135		// 先检查表结构，如果没有handleStudentID字段，则返回空记录
 136		query := `SELECT card_number, name, dept, sex, status, received_at, created_at
 137				 FROM userinfo
 138				 WHERE status = '已领取' AND handleStudentID = ?
 139				 ORDER BY received_at DESC
 140				 LIMIT ?`
 141	
 142		err := DB.Select(&records, query, handlerStudentID, limit)
 143		if err != nil {
 144			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人记录失败: %v", err)
 145		}
 146	
 147		// 如果没有handleStudentID字段，返回空数组（表示该用户还没有处理过任何记录）
 148		// 这是为了兼容还没有添加处理人字段的数据库
 149		return records, nil
 150	}

 158	
 159	// GetHandlerStats 获取每个处理人的核验统计信息，按数量降序排序
 160	func GetHandlerStats() ([]HandlerStats, error) {
 161		var stats []HandlerStats
 162	
 163		query := `SELECT
 164					handleStudentID,
 165					handleName,
 166					COUNT(*) as count
 167				 FROM userinfo
 168				 WHERE status = '已领取'
 169					AND handleStudentID IS NOT NULL
 170					AND handleStudentID != ''
 171					AND handleName IS NOT NULL
 172					AND handleName != ''
 173				 GROUP BY handleStudentID, handleName
 174				 ORDER BY count DESC`
 175	
 176		err := DB.Select(&stats, query)
 177		if err != nil {
 178			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人统计失败: %v", err)
 179		}
 180	
 181		return stats, nil
 182	}
 183	
 184	// Close 关闭数据库连接
 185	func Close() error {
 186		if DB != nil {
 187			return DB.Close()
 188		}
 189		return nil
 190	}

 56	type ManualLookupRequest struct {

 59	
 60	// ManualLookup 手动查询用户信息
 61	func ManualLookup(c *gin.Context) {
 62		var req ManualLookupRequest
 63		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 64			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 65				"code": 400,
 66				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 67			})
 68			return
 69		}
 70	
 71		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 72	
 73		// 直接从数据库查询用户信息
 74		utils.GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(req.CardNumber, &responseData)
 75	
 76		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 77			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 78			return
 79		}
 80	
 81		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 82		if responseData.HasReceived {
 83			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 84			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 85			return
 86		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 87			responseData.Msg = "非新生，不能完成报道"
 88			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 89			return
 90		}
 91	
 92		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可完成报道"
 93		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 94	}
 95	
 96	// ConfirmReceive 确认物资签领
 97	func ConfirmReceive(c *gin.Context) {
 98		var req ConfirmReceiveRequest
 99		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 100			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 101				"code": 400,
 102				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 103			})
 104			return
 105		}
 106	
 107		// 获取当前登录用户信息
 108		userInterface, exists := c.Get("user")
 109		if !exists {
 110			c.JSON(http.StatusUnauthorized, gin.H{
 111				"code": 401,
 112				"msg": "用户未登录",
 113			})
 114			return
 115		}
 116	
 117		// 类型断言获取用户信息
 118		user, ok := userInterface.(*auth.CASUser)
 119		if !ok {
 120			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 121				"code": 500,
 122				"msg": "用户信息获取失败",
 123			})
 124			return
 125		}
 126	
 127		// 保存到数据库，包含处理人信息
 128		if err := utils.UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(req.CardNumber, req.Name, req.Dept, user.Username, user.Name); err != nil {
 129			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 130				"code": 500,
 131				"msg": err.Error(),
 132			})
 133			return
 134		}
 135	
 136		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 137			"code": 200,
 138			"msg": "物资签领成功！",
 139		})
 140	}

 16	// ScanQRCode 处理二维码扫描
 17	func ScanQRCode(c *gin.Context) {
 18		var req ScanQRCodeRequest
 19		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {
 20			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 21				"code": 400,
 22				"msg": "请求参数错误",
 23			})
 24			return
 25		}
 26	
 27		var responseData utils.ResponseData
 28	
 29		// 调用微信二维码解码接口
 30		utils.GetUserInfoFromWXiaoCode(req.QRCode, &responseData, req.DeviceID)
 31	
 32		if responseData.Code != 200 {
 33			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 34			return
 35		}
 36	
 37		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 38		if responseData.Status == "已报道" {
 39			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 40			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, responseData)
 41			return
 42		} else {
 43			responseData.Msg = "扫码成功！您可完成报道"
 44			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 45		}
 46	}

 77			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 78			return
 79		}
 80	
 81		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 82		if responseData.HasReceived {
 83			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"

 90		}

 234	 // 二维码检测成功回调
 235	 onQRCodeDetected(code) {
 236	 if (!this.scanning) return;
 237	 
 238	 this.stopScanning();
 239	 
 240	 // 验证是否为深圳大学二维码
 241	 if (this.isValidSZUQRCode(code)) {
 242	 // 触发扫码成功事件
 243	 const event = new CustomEvent('qrCodeScanned', {
 244	 detail: { code: code }
 245	 });
 246	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 247	 } else {
 248	 this.showError('请扫描深圳大学个人二维码');
 249	 // 重新开始扫描
 250	 setTimeout(() => {
 251	 if (this.video && this.video.srcObject) {
 252	 this.startScanning();
 253	 }
 254	 }, 2000);
 255	 }
 256	 }
 257	
 258	 // 验证是否为有效的深圳大学二维码
 259	 isValidSZUQRCode(code) {
 260	 // 这里应该实现深圳大学二维码的验证逻辑
 261	 // 例如检查二维码格式、前缀等
 262	 
 263	 // 简单示例：检查是否包含特定标识
 264	 return code && (
 265	 code.includes('szu.edu.cn') || 
 266	 code.includes('深圳大学') ||
 267	 code.length > 10 // 简单长度检查
 268	 );
 269	 }

 274	 detail: { message: message }
 275	 });
 276	 document.dispatchEvent(event);
 277	 }
 278	}

 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）

 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})

 92	
 93	// ExportRecords 导出报道记录（CSV格式）
 94	func ExportRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 95		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 96		if err != nil {
 97			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 98				"code": 500,
 99				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 100			})
 101			return
 102		}
 103	
 104		// 设置CSV响应头
 105		c.Header("Content-Type", "text/csv")
 106		c.Header("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=freshman_registration_records.csv")
 107	
 108		// 写入CSV头部
 109		csvContent := "ID,工号,姓名,部门,报道时间,创建时间\n"
 110	
 111		// 写入数据
 112		for _, record := range records {
 113			csvContent += strconv.Itoa(record.ID) + "," +
 114				record.CardNumber + "," +
 115				record.Name + "," +
 116				record.Dept + "," +
 117				record.ReceivedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "," +
 118				record.CreatedAt.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05") + "\n"
 119		}
 120	
 121		c.String(http.StatusOK, csvContent)
 122	}

 124	// GetMyRecentRecords 获取当前登录用户最近核验的记录
 125	func GetMyRecentRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 126		// 获取当前登录用户信息
 127		userInterface, exists := c.Get("user")
 128		if !exists {
 129			c.JSON(http.StatusUnauthorized, gin.H{
 130				"code": 401,
 131				"msg": "用户未登录",
 132			})
 133			return
 134		}
 135	
 136		// 类型断言获取用户信息
 137		user, ok := userInterface.(*auth.CASUser)
 138		if !ok {
 139			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 140				"code": 500,
 141				"msg": "用户信息获取失败",
 142			})
 143			return
 144		}
 145	
 146		// 获取该用户最近核验的10条记录
 147		records, err := Mysql.GetRecentRecordsByHandler(user.Username, 10)
 148		if err != nil {
 149			log.Printf("查询用户 %s 的最近记录失败: %v", user.Username, err)
 150			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 151				"code": 500,
 152				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 153				"error": err.Error(),
 154			})
 155			return
 156		}
 157	
 158		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 159			"code": 200,
 160			"msg": "查询成功",
 161			"data": records,
 162			"total": len(records),
 163		})
 164	}

 89	 // 显示最近核验记录
 90	 displayRecentRecords(records) {
 91	 const recordsList = document.getElementById('recentRecordsList');
 92	
 93	 if (!recordsList) return;
 94	
 95	 if (!records || records.length === 0) {
 96	 recordsList.innerHTML = '<div class="no-records">暂无核验记录</div>';
 97	 return;
 98	 }
 99	
 100	 let html = '';
 101	 records.forEach(record => {
 102	 const receivedTime = new Date(record.received_at).toLocaleString('zh-CN', {
 103	 month: '2-digit',
 104	 day: '2-digit',
 105	 hour: '2-digit',
 106	 minute: '2-digit'
 107	 });
 108	
 109	 html += `
 110	 <div class="record-item">
 111	 <div class="record-name">${record.name}</div>
 112	 <div class="record-dept">${record.dept || '未知部门'}</div>
 113	 <div class="record-time">${receivedTime}</div>
 114	 </div>
 115	 `;
 116	 });
 117	
 118	 recordsList.innerHTML = html;
 119	 console.log('最近记录显示成功:', records);
 120	 }

 296	 switchMethod(method) {
 297	 // 更新标签状态
 298	 document.querySelectorAll('.method-tab').forEach(tab => {

 306	 });

 308

 54	// UpdateReceiveRecord 更新报道记录状态
 55	func UpdateReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) error {
 56		// 先检查是否已存在
 57		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 58	
 59		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 60			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 61		}
 62	
 63		// 更新记录状态
 64		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET status = '已报道', received_at = NOW()
 65				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 66	
 67		_, err := DB.Exec(query, cardNumber)
 68		if err != nil {
 69			return fmt.Errorf("更新报道状态失败: %v", err)
 70		}
 71		return nil
 72	}
 73	
 74	// UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler 更新报道记录状态并记录处理人信息
 75	func UpdateReceiveRecordWithHandler(cardNumber, name, dept, handlerStudentID, handlerName string) error {
 76		// 先检查是否已存在
 77		userInfo := GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 78	
 79		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 80			return fmt.Errorf("用户已完成报道")
 81		}
 82	
 83		// 更新记录状态，包含处理人信息
 84		query := `UPDATE userinfo SET
 85					status = '已报道',
 86					name = ?,
 87					dept = ?,
 88					handleName = ?,
 89					handleStudentID = ?,
 90					received_at = NOW()
 91				 WHERE card_number = ?`
 92	
 93		_, err := DB.Exec(query, name, dept, handlerName, handlerStudentID, cardNumber)
 94		if err != nil {

 120	// GetReceiveCount 获取签领总数
 121	func GetReceiveCount() (int, error) {
 122		var count int
 123		query := "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo"
 124		err := DB.Get(&count, query)
 125		if err != nil {
 126			return 0, fmt.Errorf("查询签领总数失败: %v", err)
 127		}
 128		return count, nil
 129	}
 130	
 131	// GetRecentRecordsByHandler 获取指定处理人最近的报道记录
 132	func GetRecentRecordsByHandler(handlerStudentID string, limit int) ([]UserInfo, error) {
 133		var records []UserInfo
 134	
 135		// 先检查表结构，如果没有handleStudentID字段，则返回空记录
 136		query := `SELECT card_number, name, dept, sex, status, received_at, created_at
 137				 FROM userinfo
 138				 WHERE status = '已报道' AND handleStudentID = ?
 139				 ORDER BY received_at DESC
 140				 LIMIT ?`
 141	
 142		err := DB.Select(&records, query, handlerStudentID, limit)
 143		if err != nil {
 144			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人记录失败: %v", err)
 145		}
 146	
 147		// 如果没有handleStudentID字段，返回空数组（表示该用户还没有处理过任何记录）
 148		// 这是为了兼容还没有添加处理人字段的数据库
 149		return records, nil
 150	}

 317	 </div>
 318	 `;

 320	 document.getElementById('detailContent').innerHTML = content;

 322	 document.getElementById('detailModal').style.display = 'flex';

 324	
 325	 // 导出数据
 326	 exportData() {
 327	 if (this.statsData.length === 0) {
 328	 this.showError('暂无数据可导出');
 329	 return;
 330	 }
 331	
 332	 // 创建CSV内容
 333	 const headers = ['排名', '姓名', '学工号', '核验数量', '占比'];
 334	 const totalRecords = this.statsData.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0);
 335	 
 336	 const csvContent = [
 337	 headers.join(','),
 338	 ...this.statsData.map((item, index) => {
 339	 const rank = index + 1;
 340	 const percentage = totalRecords > 0 ? ((item.count / totalRecords) * 100).toFixed(1) : '0.0';
 341	 return [rank, item.handle_name, item.handle_student_id, item.count, percentage + '%'].join(',');
 342	 })
 343	 ].join('\n');

 89	 // 显示最近报道记录
 90	 displayRecentRecords(records) {
 91	 const recordsList = document.getElementById('recentRecordsList');
 92	
 93	 if (!recordsList) return;
 94	
 95	 if (!records || records.length === 0) {
 96	 recordsList.innerHTML = '<div class="no-records">暂无报道记录</div>';
 97	 return;
 98	 }
 99	
 100	 let html = '';
 101	 records.forEach(record => {
 102	 const receivedTime = new Date(record.received_at).toLocaleString('zh-CN', {
 103	 month: '2-digit',
 104	 day: '2-digit',
 105	 hour: '2-digit',
 106	 minute: '2-digit'
 107	 });
 108	
 109	 html += `
 110	 <div class="record-item">
 111	 <div class="record-name">${record.name}</div>
 112	 <div class="record-dept">${record.dept || '未知部门'}</div>
 113	 <div class="record-time">${receivedTime}</div>
 114	 </div>
 115	 `;
 116	 });
 117	
 118	 recordsList.innerHTML = html;
 119	 console.log('最近记录显示成功:', records);
 120	 }

 1	package handlers
 2	
 3	import (
 4		"log"
 5		"materials/auth"
 6		"net/http"
 7		"strconv"
 8	
 9		"materials/Mysql"

 11		"github.com/gin-gonic/gin"
 12	)
 13	
 14	// GetAllRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）
 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}
 33	
 34	// GetReceiveStats 获取报道统计信息
 35	func GetReceiveStats(c *gin.Context) {
 36		count, err := Mysql.GetReceiveCount()
 37		if err != nil {
 38			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 39				"code": 500,
 40				"msg": "查询统计失败",
 41				"error": err.Error(),
 42			})
 43			return
 44		}
 45	
 46		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 47			"code": 200,
 48			"msg": "查询成功",
 49			"data": gin.H{
 50				"total_received": count,
 51			},
 52		})
 53	}
 54	
 55	// GetUserRecord 获取特定用户的报道记录
 56	func GetUserRecord(c *gin.Context) {
 57		cardNumber := c.Param("cardNumber")
 58		if cardNumber == "" {
 59			c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{
 60				"code": 400,
 61				"msg": "参数错误",
 62			})
 63			return
 64		}
 65	
 66		record := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 67		if record.Name != "" {
 68			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 69				"code": 500,
 70				"msg": "查询失败",
 71			})
 72			return
 73		}
 74	
 75		if record.Status == "" {
 76			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 77				"code": 200,
 78				"msg": "用户未报道",
 79				"data": nil,
 80				"has_received": false,
 81			})
 82			return
 83		}
 84	
 85		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 86			"code": 200,
 87			"msg": "查询成功",
 88			"data": record,
 89			"has_received": true,
 90		})
 91	}

 124	// GetMyRecentRecords 获取当前登录用户最近报道的记录
 125	func GetMyRecentRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 126		// 获取当前登录用户信息
 127		userInterface, exists := c.Get("user")
 128		if !exists {
 129			c.JSON(http.StatusUnauthorized, gin.H{
 130				"code": 401,
 131				"msg": "用户未登录",
 132			})
 133			return
 134		}
 135	
 136		// 类型断言获取用户信息
 137		user, ok := userInterface.(*auth.CASUser)
 138		if !ok {
 139			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 140				"code": 500,
 141				"msg": "用户信息获取失败",
 142			})
 143			return
 144		}
 145	
 146		// 获取该用户最近报道的10条记录
 147		records, err := Mysql.GetRecentRecordsByHandler(user.Username, 10)
 148		if err != nil {
 149			log.Printf("查询用户 %s 的最近记录失败: %v", user.Username, err)
 150			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 151				"code": 500,
 152				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 153				"error": err.Error(),
 154			})
 155			return
 156		}
 157	
 158		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 159			"code": 200,
 160			"msg": "查询成功",
 161			"data": records,
 162			"total": len(records),
 163		})
 164	}

 20	func ScanQRCode(c *gin.Context) {
 21		var req ScanQRCodeRequest
 22		if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&req); err != nil {

 84		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 85		if responseData.HasReceived {
 86			responseData.Msg = "您已完成报道，无法重复报道。如有疑问请联系管理员"
 87			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 88			return
 89		} else if responseData.Name == "" {
 90			responseData.Msg = "非新生，不能完成报道"
 91			c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 92			return
 93		}
 94	
 95		responseData.Msg = "查询成功！您可完成报道"
 96		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, responseData)
 97	}

 145	func SentMessageToYIQing(searchData string) {
 146		//发送消息致电子哨兵后台
 147		url := "http://210.39.8.33:5024/GetUserInfo"
 148		client := &http.Client{}
 149	
 150		Body := `{"deviceId":"志愿者扫码","idcard":"","name":"","searchData":"` + searchData + `","type":3,"wlkh":"","wxCode":""}`
 151	
 152		reader := bytes.NewReader([]byte(Body))
 153		req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", url, reader)
 154		if err != nil {
 155			fmt.Println(err)
 156			return
 157		}
 158		req.Header["Content-Type"] = []string{"application/json"}
 159		resp, err := client.Do(req)
 160		defer resp.Body.Close()
 161		body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
 162		fmt.Println("body", string(body))
 163	}

 130	
 131	// GetUserInfoFromCardNumber 根据学工号直接查询用户信息
 132	func GetUserInfoFromCardNumber(cardNumber string, responseData *ResponseData) {
 133		// 从数据库查询用户信息
 134		userInfo := Mysql.GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber)
 135	
 136		// 检查用户是否存在
 137		if userInfo.Name == "" {
 138			responseData.Code = 400
 139			responseData.Msg = "未找到该学工号对应的用户信息，请检查学工号是否正确"
 140			return
 141		}
 142	
 143		// 设置响应数据
 144		responseData.CredentialNo = cardNumber
 145		responseData.Name = userInfo.Name
 146		responseData.Dept = userInfo.Dept
 147		responseData.Status = userInfo.Status
 148		responseData.Code = 200
 149		responseData.Msg = "查询成功"
 150		responseData.PassCode = 1
 151		responseData.IsNeedHealthData = false
 152	
 153		// 检查是否已经完成报道
 154		if userInfo.Status == "已报道" {
 155			responseData.HasReceived = true
 156		} else {
 157			responseData.HasReceived = false
 158		}
 159	
 160		return
 161	}
