 99	
 100	// GetUserReceiveRecord 获取用户报道记录
 101	func GetUserReceiveRecord(cardNumber string) UserInfo {
 102		var userInfo UserInfo
 103	
 104		DB.QueryRow("select card_number,name,dept,status from userinfo where card_number = ? LIMIT 1", cardNumber).
 105			Scan(&userInfo.CardNumber, &userInfo.Name, &userInfo.Dept, &userInfo.Status)
 106		return userInfo
 107	}
 108	
 109	// GetAllReceiveRecords 获取所有报道记录（管理功能）
 110	func GetAllReceiveRecords() ([]UserInfo, error) {
 111		var records []UserInfo
 112		query := "SELECT * FROM userinfo ORDER BY created_at DESC"
 113		err := DB.Select(&records, query)
 114		if err != nil {
 115			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询所有记录失败: %v", err)
 116		}
 117		return records, nil
 118	}

 130	
 131	// GetRecentRecordsByHandler 获取指定处理人最近的报道记录
 132	func GetRecentRecordsByHandler(handlerStudentID string, limit int) ([]UserInfo, error) {
 133		var records []UserInfo
 134	
 135		// 先检查表结构，如果没有handleStudentID字段，则返回空记录
 136		query := `SELECT card_number, name, dept, sex, status, received_at, created_at
 137				 FROM userinfo
 138				 WHERE status = '已报道' AND handleStudentID = ?
 139				 ORDER BY received_at DESC
 140				 LIMIT ?`
 141	
 142		err := DB.Select(&records, query, handlerStudentID, limit)
 143		if err != nil {
 144			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人记录失败: %v", err)
 145		}
 146	
 147		// 如果没有handleStudentID字段，返回空数组（表示该用户还没有处理过任何记录）
 148		// 这是为了兼容还没有添加处理人字段的数据库
 149		return records, nil
 150	}

 158	
 159	// GetHandlerStats 获取每个处理人的报道统计信息，按数量降序排序
 160	func GetHandlerStats() ([]HandlerStats, error) {
 161		var stats []HandlerStats
 162	
 163		query := `SELECT
 164					handleStudentID,
 165					handleName,
 166					COUNT(*) as count
 167				 FROM userinfo
 168				 WHERE status = '已报道'
 169					AND handleStudentID IS NOT NULL
 170					AND handleStudentID != ''
 171					AND handleName IS NOT NULL
 172					AND handleName != ''
 173				 GROUP BY handleStudentID, handleName
 174				 ORDER BY count DESC`
 175	
 176		err := DB.Select(&stats, query)
 177		if err != nil {
 178			return nil, fmt.Errorf("查询处理人统计失败: %v", err)
 179		}
 180	
 181		return stats, nil
 182	}
 183	
 184	// Close 关闭数据库连接
 185	func Close() error {
 186		if DB != nil {
 187			return DB.Close()
 188		}
 189		return nil
 190	}

 114	 </div>

 75	 async loadStatsData() {

 78	 try {
 79	 const response = await fetch('/api/admin/handler-stats');

 95	 this.hideLoading();

 97	 }
 98	
 99	 // 渲染统计概览
 100	 renderStatsOverview() {
 101	 const totalHandlers = this.statsData.length;
 102	 const totalRecords = this.statsData.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0);
 103	 const avgRecords = totalHandlers > 0 ? Math.round(totalRecords / totalHandlers) : 0;
 104	
 105	 document.getElementById('totalHandlers').textContent = totalHandlers;
 106	 document.getElementById('totalRecords').textContent = totalRecords;
 107	 document.getElementById('avgRecords').textContent = avgRecords;
 108	 }
 109	
 110	 // 渲染排行榜列表
 111	 renderRankingList() {
 112	 const container = document.getElementById('rankingList');
 113	 
 114	 if (this.statsData.length === 0) {
 115	 container.innerHTML = '<div class="loading-placeholder">暂无统计数据</div>';
 116	 return;
 117	 }

 89	 // 显示最近报道记录
 90	 displayRecentRecords(records) {
 91	 const recordsList = document.getElementById('recentRecordsList');
 92	
 93	 if (!recordsList) return;
 94	
 95	 if (!records || records.length === 0) {
 96	 recordsList.innerHTML = '<div class="no-records">暂无报道记录</div>';
 97	 return;
 98	 }
 99	
 100	 let html = '';
 101	 records.forEach(record => {
 102	 const receivedTime = new Date(record.received_at).toLocaleString('zh-CN', {
 103	 month: '2-digit',
 104	 day: '2-digit',
 105	 hour: '2-digit',
 106	 minute: '2-digit'
 107	 });
 108	
 109	 html += `
 110	 <div class="record-item">
 111	 <div class="record-name">${record.name}</div>
 112	 <div class="record-dept">${record.dept || '未知部门'}</div>
 113	 <div class="record-time">${receivedTime}</div>
 114	 </div>
 115	 `;
 116	 });
 117	
 118	 recordsList.innerHTML = html;
 119	 console.log('最近记录显示成功:', records);
 120	 }
 121

 126	 recordsList.innerHTML = '<div class="no-records">暂无报道记录</div>';
 127	 }
 128	 }

 411	 async handleQRCodeScanned(code) {
 412	 this.showLoading();
 413	 
 414	 try {
 415	 const response = await fetch('/api/scan-qrcode', {
 416	 method: 'POST',
 417	 headers: {
 418	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 419	 },
 420	 body: JSON.stringify({
 421	 qr_code: code,
 422	 device_id: this.getDeviceId()
 423	 })
 424	 });
 425	
 426	 const data = await response.json();
 427	 this.hideLoading();
 428	
 429	 if (data.code === 200) {
 430	 this.currentUser = data;
 431	 this.showResult(data);
 432	 } else {
 433	 this.showError(data.msg || '二维码识别失败，请重试');
 434	 this.goBack();
 435	 }
 436	 } catch (error) {
 437	 this.hideLoading();
 438	 this.showError('网络错误，请检查网络连接');
 439	 this.goBack();
 440	 }
 441	 }

 443	 // 显示扫描结果
 444	 showResult(data) {
 445	 this.showPage('resultPage');
 446	 
 447	 const resultIcon = document.getElementById('resultIcon');
 448	 const resultMessage = document.getElementById('resultMessage');
 449	 const userInfo = document.getElementById('userInfo');
 450	 const confirmButton = document.getElementById('confirmButton');
 451	
 452	 if (data.has_received) {
 453	 // 已报道
 454	 resultIcon.textContent = '⚠️';
 455	 resultIcon.style.color = '#ffc107';
 456	 resultMessage.innerHTML = `<strong>${data.name}（${data.credential_no}）</strong><br>您已完成报道，无法重复报道<br><small>如有疑问请联系管理员</small>`;
 457	 confirmButton.style.display = 'none';
 458	 } else {
 459	 // 可以报道
 460	 resultIcon.textContent = '✅';
 461	 resultIcon.style.color = '#28a745';
 462	 resultMessage.innerHTML = `<strong>扫码成功！</strong><br>${data.name}（${data.credential_no}）<br>您可完成报道`;
 463	 confirmButton.style.display = 'block';
 464	 }
 465	
 466	 // 显示用户信息
 467	 userInfo.innerHTML = `
 468	 <p><strong>姓名：</strong>${data.name}</p>
 469	 <p><strong>工号：</strong>${data.credential_no}</p>
 470	 ${data.dept ? `<p><strong>部门：</strong>${data.dept}</p>` : ''}
 471	 `;
 472	 }
 473	
 474	 // 确认报道
 475	 async confirmReceive() {
 476	 if (!this.currentUser) return;
 477	
 478	 this.showLoading();
 479	
 480	 try {
 481	 const response = await fetch('/api/confirm-receive', {
 482	 method: 'POST',
 483	 headers: {
 484	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 485	 },
 486	 body: JSON.stringify({
 487	 card_number: this.currentUser.credential_no,
 488	 name: this.currentUser.name,
 489	 dept: this.currentUser.dept || ''
 490	 })
 491	 });
 492	
 493	 const data = await response.json();
 494	 this.hideLoading();
 495	
 496	 if (data.code === 200) {
 497	 // 报道成功
 498	 const resultIcon = document.getElementById('resultIcon');
 499	 const resultMessage = document.getElementById('resultMessage');
 500	 const confirmButton = document.getElementById('confirmButton');
 501	
 502	 resultIcon.textContent = '';
 503	 resultIcon.style.color = '#28a745';
 504	 resultMessage.innerHTML = `<strong>新生报道成功！</strong><br>感谢您的参与`;
 505	 confirmButton.style.display = 'none';
 506	
 507	 // 刷新最近报道记录
 508	 this.loadRecentRecords();
 509	 } else {
 510	 this.showError(data.msg || '报道失败，请重试');
 511	 }
 512	 } catch (error) {
 513	 this.hideLoading();
 514	 this.showError('网络错误，请重试');
 515	 }
 516	 }

 518	 // 返回首页
 519	 goBack() {
 520	 this.showPage('homePage');
 521	 }
 522	
 523	 // 返回首页
 524	 goHome() {
 525	 this.currentUser = null;
 526	 this.showPage('homePage');

 528	 const cardNumberInput = document.getElementById('cardNumberInput');
 529	 if (cardNumberInput) {

 534	 // 处理物理返回键
 535	 handleBackKey() {
 536	 const activePage = document.querySelector('.page.active');
 537	 if (activePage.id === 'scanPage') {
 538	 this.goBack();
 539	 } else if (activePage.id === 'resultPage') {
 540	 this.goHome();
 541	 }
 542	 }

 565	 // 获取设备ID
 566	 getDeviceId() {
 567	 let deviceId = localStorage.getItem('deviceId');
 568	 if (!deviceId) {
 569	 deviceId = 'device-' + Date.now() + '-' + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9);
 570	 localStorage.setItem('deviceId', deviceId);
 571	 }
 572	 return deviceId;
 573	 }
 574	}

 15	func GetAllRecords(c *gin.Context) {
 16		records, err := Mysql.GetAllReceiveRecords()
 17		if err != nil {
 18			c.JSON(http.StatusInternalServerError, gin.H{
 19				"code": 500,
 20				"msg": "查询记录失败",
 21				"error": err.Error(),
 22			})
 23			return
 24		}
 25	
 26		c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{
 27			"code": 200,
 28			"msg": "查询成功",
 29			"data": records,
 30			"total": len(records),
 31		})
 32	}

 145	func SentMessageToYIQing(searchData string) {
 146		//发送消息致电子哨兵后台
 147		url := "http://210.39.8.33:5024/GetUserInfo"
 148		client := &http.Client{}
 149	
 150		Body := `{"deviceId":"志愿者扫码","idcard":"","name":"","searchData":"` + searchData + `","type":3,"wlkh":"","wxCode":""}`
 151	
 152		reader := bytes.NewReader([]byte(Body))
 153		req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", url, reader)
 154		if err != nil {
 155			fmt.Println(err)
 156			return
 157		}
 158		req.Header["Content-Type"] = []string{"application/json"}
 159		resp, err := client.Do(req)
 160		defer resp.Body.Close()
 161		body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
 162		fmt.Println("body", string(body))
 163	}
